member.name: ID2D1SvgStrokeDashArray.GetDashes
member.param: The element count of the array in the dashes argument.
The index of the first dash to retrieve.
member.returns: This method returns an HRESULT success or error code.

member.name: ID2D1SvgStrokeDashArray.GetDashes
member.param: The element count of the array in the dashes argument.
The index of the first dash to retrieve.
member.returns: This method returns an HRESULT success or error code.

member.name: ID2D1SvgStrokeDashArray.GetDashesCount
member.summary: Gets the number of the dashes in the array.
member.returns: Returns the number of the dashes in the array.

member.name: ID2D1SvgStrokeDashArray.RemoveDashesAtEnd
member.summary: Removes dashes from the end of the array.
member.param: Specifies how many dashes to remove.
member.returns: This method returns an HRESULT success or error code.

member.name: ID2D1SvgStrokeDashArray.UpdateDashes
member.summary: Updates the array. Existing dashes not updated by this method are preserved. The array is resized larger if necessary to accommodate the new dashes.
member.param: The number of dashes to update.
The index at which to begin updating dashes. Must be less than or equal to the size of the array.
member.returns: This method returns an HRESULT success or error code.

member.name: ID2D1SvgStrokeDashArray.UpdateDashes
member.summary: Updates the array. Existing dashes not updated by this method are preserved. The array is resized larger if necessary to accommodate the new dashes.
member.param: The number of dashes to update.
The index at which to begin updating dashes. Must be less than or equal to the size of the array.
member.returns: This method returns an HRESULT success or error code.

member.name: ID2D1SvgStrokeDashArray
member.summary: Interface describing an SVG stroke-dasharray value.
